traits.name: Awakening of the Scion
entries: The cradle is a container for the {@creature scion of Stronmaus|BGG}. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body bursts into light. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The cradle makes three Slam or Spit Hailstone attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Spit Hailstone
entries: Ranged atk +18 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.

actions.name: Lightning Barrage {@recharge 5}
entries: The cradle hurls multiple magical lightning bolts at up to two creatures it can see within 500 feet of itself. Each target must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 71 (11d12 damage) lightning damage and has the {@condition stunned} condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.
